name: Fanpla
description: Fanpla is a Web3 fan engagement platform that provides digital tools for artists, creators, and their communities. The project introduces the Fanpla (FPL), a utility asset used within the platform to access fan-related services, receive community rewards, participate in voting mechanisms, and interact with NFT features. Fanpla supports functions such as purchasing and using NFTs for fan experiences, accessing exclusive content, and enabling token-based participation in community activities. The project’s whitepaper outlines the token’s supply, distribution model, vesting structure, and the platform’s planned technical development.
